results.title: Metformin treatment of high-fat diet-fed obese male mice restores sperm function and fetal growth, without requiring weight loss
results.text_hl: This occurred in the absence of a change in body weight or @DISEASE_Neoplasms_Adipose_Tissue @DISEASE_MESH:D018205 @@@adiposity@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment of HFD-fed males restored testicular morphology (+33%, P < 0.05), sperm motility (+66%, P < 0.05), sperm-zona pellucida binding (+25%, P < 0.05), sperm intracellular @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@ROS@@@ concentrations (-32%, P < 0.05), and oxidative DNA @<m>DISEASE_Mouth_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009059 @@@lesions@@@ (-45%, P < 0.05) to the levels of the @DISEASE_Congenital_central_hypoventilation_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C536209 @@@CD@@@ males.

results.title: Oncogenic H-RAS induces metformin resistance in head and neck cancer by promoting glycolytic metabolism.
results.text_hl: However, the intricate relationship between genetic alterations in @DISEASE_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma_of_Head_and_Neck @DISEASE_MESH:D000077195 @@@HNSCC@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ sensitivity is still poorly understood, which prevents the stratifications of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ harboring @<m>DISEASE_Mouth_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009059 @@@oral premalignant lesions@@@ that may benefit from the chemopreventive activity of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin-Induced Fixed-Drug Eruption Confirmed by Multiple Exposures
results.text_hl: We describe a 56-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who developed a @DISEASE_Drug_Eruptions @DISEASE_MESH:D003875 @@@FDE@@@ with multiple exposures to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Upon each exposure, small, round, @<m>DISEASE_Mouth_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009059 @@@erythematic lesions@@@ developed on the palms of the hands and soles of the feet; these lesions resolved each time after discontinuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
